Plot: The story revolves around the flashback of a young man. We glimpse into his life at eight years old and see that his family life led him to be emotionally distant. Through the care of a family friend he experiences an alternative to hurt.
Title: Spilt Milk
Writer: Victoria Hindes, Favour Onwuka, Larissa Tenorio
Actors: Evryle Ebora, Allison Farrance, Dov Alexander, Brittany Grant
